kpa.command

Class UndoRedo

  • java.lang.Object
    • kpa.command.UndoRedo

  • public class UndoRedo
extends java.lang.Object
    Facilities for an undo-redo mechanism, on the basis of commands.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      (package private) java.util.Stack<Command> redoStack 
      (package private) java.util.Stack<Command> undoStack
      All commands in undoStack have been executed and can be undo All commands in redoStack are un-executed and can be re-executed

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      UndoRedo() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean canRedo()
      Returns whether a redo is possible.
      boolean canUndo()
      Returns whether an undo is possible.
      void clear()
      Clears all undo-redo history.
      void did(Command command)
      Adds given command to the do-history.
      Command lastDone()
      Returns command most recently done.
      Command lastUndone()
      Returns command most recently undone.
      void redo()
      Redo the most recently undone command.
      void redoAll()
      Redo all undone commands.
      void undo(boolean redoable)
      Undo the most recently done command, optionally allowing it to be redone.
      void undoAll(boolean redoable)
      Undo all done commands.
